author: Staff Reporter
text:
Showcasing textile products made of power looms, a five-day exhibition-cum- buyer-seller meet organised by the regional office of Textile Commissioner and Power loom Development and Export Promotion Council (PDEXCIL) commenced here on Wednesday.

The fair is opened to the visitors and buyers from 10 a.m. to 8 p.m. at S. A. Khader Saleema Marriage Hall.

G. Kumaravel, the Assistant Director at the regional office of Textile Commissioner, Coimbatore, under the Union Ministry of Textiles, told The Hindu that the main objective of the fair was to give a platform for the producers of textile products using power loom from across the country to find marketing linkages for their products.
title: Exhibition
